attributes.action: outlaw the advertising of jobs in England to be done in England in languages other than English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 8 million more British people are out of work than should be. They do seek employment and many try to claim Job Seekers Allowance while doing that. But if they cannot read, say, Polish many vacancies are denied them. Advertising for workers in a way that excludes one group for not having learned to read that foreign language is unfair and discriminatory. One might even think it racist.
